Day 8
======

# Challenge

We want you to crack this __unusual__ RSA system.

# Category
Crypto

# Description
The public key is:

```



```

And the cipher text is:

```

```

You need to use the public key to crack the cipher text. It seems impossible, but please take a look at the public key, which is very special. 
If you don't know anything about RSA and want a simple introduction to RSA, please look at [this](./RSA.pdf).
This challenge may be hard for beginners, so just feel free to read the solution if you have no idea.
# Credit
BCTF 2015
